feature.label: AASPE Tools
feature.description:
Automated Assurance of Security Policy Enforcement (AASPE) About the tools
The AASPE tools are designed for making secure and safe safety-critical systems. The tools are using AADL and the OSATE toolset. It provides the following features:
Attack Impact meta-model Attack Impact graphical editor Attack Tree editor meta-model Attack Tree graphical editor Bridge from Attack Impact to Attack Tree Bridge from AADL to Attack Impact
